title: Easter brush script frenzy!... any idea about the NOW NOW face?
content:
Hello again. Looking for a platform for a custom script treatment - found this treatment here and was wondering if anyone could help id the base font...

Unfortunately I cant remember where i got this sample from.

thanks for your time and expertise!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121625im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NotNow_6582.png)

 [‹ WMacro?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121625/http:/typophile.com/node/43452 "Go to previous forum topic") [ALLIGATOR movie font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121625/http:/typophile.com/node/43451 "Go to next forum topic")
author: modernactivity

comments.content:
Dom Casual Bold Italic is similar:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/dom-casual-sh/bold-italic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121625/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/dom-casual-sh/bold-italic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/dom-casual-sh/bold-italic/")

as is House Brush:  
 [http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=23&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121625/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=23&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=23&subpage=viewfonts")

not bad - both of these are close with a bit of manipulation - I found a site I never heard of before that has a good selection of signwriter type - and a typeface which is also pretty close - [http://www.signdna.com/v2/cart/product.php?cat\_id=63&gp=&prod\_id=305](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121625/http:/www.signdna.com/v2/cart/product.php?cat_id=63&gp=&prod_id=305 "http://www.signdna.com/v2/cart/product.php?cat\_id=63&gp=&prod\_id=305")

thanks for the tips!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324121625im_/http:/typophile.com/files/000305_d_5563.jpg)
